mapper.update: create table ${siteId}_hit_keyword ( categoryId varchar(30), timeId varchar(11), keyword varchar(128), hit int, primary key (categoryId, timeId, keyword) ) ${option}
create index timeId_${siteId}_hit_keyword on ${siteId}_hit_keyword(categoryId, timeId, keyword)
mapper.select: select categoryId, timeId, keyword, hit from ${siteId}_hit_keyword where categoryId = ''
mapper.insert: insert into ${siteId}_hit_keyword (categoryId, timeId, keyword, hit) (select #{categoryId} as categoryId, #{timeId} as timeId,#{keyword} as keyword, #{hit} as hit from ${siteId}_hit_keyword where categoryId=#{categoryId} and timeId=#{timeId} and keyword=#{keyword})
